text: Kiyoshi Arai is a former professional baseball player for Japan. He initially played in the California League for the Salinas Spurs He later played for the Yakult Swallows in the Japan Central League. He later played for Yokohama BayStars in the Japan Central League and the Orix BlueWave in the Japan Pacific League. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball people from Gunma Prefecture Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Japanese expatriate baseball players in the United States Category:Salinas Spurs players Category:Yakult Swallows players Category:Yokohama BayStars players Category:Orix BlueWave players
title: Kiyoshi Arai
